aiSummary: K. M. Prasanna Kumar is a public awareness specialist with an H-index of 30 at Diabetes Federation (Member). Has been published in Journal of Human Reproductive Sciences, Life Sciences, Cell and Tissue Research. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
